description: The defendant for an individual prosecution case.  Defendant details are NOT associated to multiple prosecution cases.  HMCTS business does not have authority to merge defendant details or recognise a single view of defendant

masterDefendantId.description: Technical identifier that uniquely identifies the defendant on CPP i.e. across prosecution cases.  Case defendants that are the same person will be matched and provided the same defendantMasterId

courtProceedingsInitiated.description: The date time that court proceedings for this defendant were initiated.  Optional for PCF but needs to be set when initiateCourtProceedings or referCasesToCourt progression commands are executed and in that sense is mandatory for the end to end court journey.  Required for hearing to understand the most recent defendant information, latest details must be rendered for initiated hearings so that the defendant is always arraigned against the latest known details.

numberOfPreviousConvictionsCited.description: The number of previous convictions cited by the case prosecuting authority

prosecutionAuthorityReference.description: The prosecuting authorities reference for the defendant for the given case

offences.description: The set of all the offences against a defendant (not only on this final hearing)

defenceOrganisation.description: The organisation details of the defence representation

personDefendant.description: When the defendant is a person the additional person specific details for the defendant

legalEntityDefendant.description: When the defendant is a legal entity the additional legal entity specific details for the defendant

proceedingsConcluded.description: Indicates that proceedings for the defendant have been concluded i.e. all offences have been disposed with final results or have been withdrawn by the prosecuting authority

judicialResults.description: A record of any judicial decisions and results made against the defendant

croNumber.description: National Identification Service (formerly Criminal Records Office) Number (fingerprint number)
